00031         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00032         OgreOggStaticSound::OgreOggStaticSound(const Ogre::String& name) : OgreOggISound(name)
00033         ,mOggFile(0)
00034         ,mVorbisInfo(0)
00035         ,mVorbisComment(0)
00036         ,mPreviousOffset(0)
00037         ,mAudioName("")
00038         ,mBuffer(0)
00039         {
00040                 mStream=false;
00041         }
00042         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00043         OgreOggStaticSound::~OgreOggStaticSound()
00044         {
00045                 _release();
00046                 mOggFile=0;
00047                 mVorbisInfo=0;
00048                 mVorbisComment=0;
00049                 mBufferData.clear();
00050         }
00051         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00052         void OgreOggStaticSound::open(Ogre::DataStreamPtr& fileStream)
00053         {
00054                 int result;
00055 
00056                 // Store stream pointer
00057                 mAudioStream = fileStream;
00058 
00059                 // Store file name
00060                 mAudioName = mAudioStream->getName();
00061 
00062                 // Seekable file?
00063                 if(!ov_seekable(&mOggStream))
00064                 {
00065                         // Disable seeking
00066                         mOggCallbacks.seek_func=NULL;
00067                         mOggCallbacks.tell_func=NULL;
00068                         mSeekable = false;
00069                 }
00070 
00071                 if((result = ov_open_callbacks(&mAudioStream, &mOggStream, NULL, 0, mOggCallbacks)) < 0)
00072                 {
00073                         throw string("Could not open Ogg stream. ");
00074                         return;
00075                 }
00076 
00077                 mVorbisInfo = ov_info(&mOggStream, -1);
00078                 mVorbisComment = ov_comment(&mOggStream, -1);
00079 
00080                 // Get playtime in secs
00081                 mPlayTime = ov_time_total(&mOggStream, -1);
00082 
00083                 // Check format support
00084                 if (!_queryBufferInfo())
00085                         throw std::string("Format NOT supported!");
00086 
00087                 alGenBuffers(1, &mBuffer);
00088 
00089                 char* data;
00090                 int sizeRead = 0;
00091                 int bitStream;
00092 
00093                 data = new char[mBufferSize];
00094                 do
00095                 {
00096                         sizeRead = ov_read(&mOggStream, data, static_cast<int>(mBufferSize), 0, 2, 1, &bitStream);
00097                         mBufferData.insert(mBufferData.end(), data, data + sizeRead);
00098                 }
00099                 while(sizeRead > 0);
00100                 delete [] data;
00101 
00102 #ifndef LINUX
00103                 // Upload to XRAM buffers if available
00104                 if ( OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().hasXRamSupport() )
00105                         OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().setXRamBuffer(1, &mBuffer);
00106 #endif
00107 
00108                 alGetError();
00109                 alBufferData(mBuffer, mFormat, &mBufferData[0], static_cast<ALsizei>(mBufferData.size()), mVorbisInfo->rate);
00110                 if ( alGetError()!=AL_NO_ERROR )
00111                 {
00112                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- OgreOggStaticSound::open() - Unable to load audio data into buffer!!", Ogre::LML_CRITICAL);
00113                         throw std::string("Unable to load buffers with data!");
00114                 }
00115 
00116                 // Register shared buffer
00117                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().registerSharedBuffer(mAudioName, mBuffer);
00118 
00119                 // Ready for playback
00120                 mFileOpened = true;
00121         }
00122 
00123         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00124         void OgreOggStaticSound::open(const Ogre::String& fName, ALuint& buffer)
00125         {
00126                 // Set buffer
00127                 mBuffer = buffer;
00128 
00129                 // Filename
00130                 mAudioName = fName;
00131 
00132                 // Ready for playback
00133                 mFileOpened = true;
00134         }

00136         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00137         void OgreOggStaticSound::_release()
00138         {
00139                 ALuint src=AL_NONE;
00140                 setSource(src);
00141                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().releaseSharedBuffer(mAudioName, mBuffer);
00142                 if ( !mAudioStream.isNull() ) ov_clear(&mOggStream);
00143                 mPlayPosChanged = false;
00144                 mPlayPos = 0.f;
00145         }
00146         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00147         void OgreOggStaticSound::_prebuffer()
00148         {
00149                 if (mSource==AL_NONE) return;
00150 
00151                 // Queue buffer
00152                 alSourcei(mSource, AL_BUFFER, mBuffer);
00153         }
00154 
00155         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00156         bool OgreOggStaticSound::_queryBufferInfo()
00157         {
00158                 if (!mVorbisInfo)
00159                 {
00160                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("*** --- No vorbis info!");
00161                         return false;
00162                 }
00163 
00164                 switch(mVorbisInfo->channels)
00165                 {
00166                 case 1:
00167                         {
00168                                 mFormat = AL_FORMAT_MONO16;
00169                                 // Set BufferSize to 250ms (Frequency * 2 (16bit) divided by 4 (quarter of a second))
00170                                 mBufferSize = mVorbisInfo->rate >> 1;
00171                                 // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00172                                 mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % 2);
00173                         }
00174                         break;
00175                 case 2:
00176                         {
00177                                 mFormat = AL_FORMAT_STEREO16;
00178                                 // Set BufferSize to 250ms (Frequency * 4 (16bit stereo) divided by 4 (quarter of a second))
00179                                 mBufferSize = mVorbisInfo->rate;
00180                                 // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00181                                 mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % 4);
00182                         }
00183                         break;
00184                 case 4:
00185                         {
00186                                 mFormat = alGetEnumValue("AL_FORMAT_QUAD16");
00187                                 if (!mFormat) return false;
00188                                 // Set BufferSize to 250ms (Frequency * 8 (16bit 4-channel) divided by 4 (quarter of a second))
00189                                 mBufferSize = mVorbisInfo->rate * 2;
00190                                 // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00191                                 mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % 8);
00192                         }
00193                         break;
00194                 case 6:
00195                         {
00196                                 mFormat = alGetEnumValue("AL_FORMAT_51CHN16");
00197                                 if (!mFormat) return false;
00198                                 // Set BufferSize to 250ms (Frequency * 12 (16bit 6-channel) divided by 4 (quarter of a second))
00199                                 mBufferSize = mVorbisInfo->rate * 3;
00200                                 // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00201                                 mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % 12);
00202                         }
00203                         break;
00204                 case 7:
00205                         {
00206                                 mFormat = alGetEnumValue("AL_FORMAT_61CHN16");
00207                                 if (!mFormat) return false;
00208                                 // Set BufferSize to 250ms (Frequency * 16 (16bit 7-channel) divided by 4 (quarter of a second))
00209                                 mBufferSize = mVorbisInfo->rate * 4;
00210                                 // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00211                                 mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % 16);
00212                         }
00213                         break;
00214                 case 8:
00215                         {
00216                                 mFormat = alGetEnumValue("AL_FORMAT_71CHN16");
00217                                 if (!mFormat) return false;
00218                                 // Set BufferSize to 250ms (Frequency * 20 (16bit 8-channel) divided by 4 (quarter of a second))
00219                                 mBufferSize = mVorbisInfo->rate * 5;
00220                                 // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00221                                 mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % 20);
00222                         }
00223                         break;
00224                 default:
00225                         // Couldn't determine buffer format so log the error and default to mono
00226                         Ogre::LogManager::getSingleton().logMessage("!!WARNING!! Could not determine buffer format!  Defaulting to MONO");
00227 
00228                         mFormat = AL_FORMAT_MONO16;
00229                         // Set BufferSize to 250ms (Frequency * 2 (16bit) divided by 4 (quarter of a second))
00230                         mBufferSize = mVorbisInfo->rate >> 1;
00231                         // IMPORTANT : The Buffer Size must be an exact multiple of the BlockAlignment ...
00232                         mBufferSize -= (mBufferSize % 2);
00233                         break;
00234                 }
00235                 return true;
00236         }
00237         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00238         void OgreOggStaticSound::setSource(ALuint& src)
00239         {
00240                 if (src!=AL_NONE)
00241                 {
00242                         // Attach new source
00243                         mSource=src;
00244 
00245                         // Load audio data onto source
00246                         _prebuffer();
00247 
00248                         // Init source properties
00249                         _initSource();
00250                 }
00251                 else
00252                 {
00253                         // Need to stop sound BEFORE unqueuing
00254                         alSourceStop(mSource);
00255 
00256                         // Unqueue buffer
00257                         alSourcei(mSource, AL_BUFFER, 0);
00258 
00259                         // Attach new source
00260                         mSource=src;
00261                 }
00262         }
00263         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00264         void OgreOggStaticSound::pause()
00265         {
00266 #if OGGSOUND_THREADED
00267                 boost::recursive_mutex::scoped_lock l(mMutex);
00268 
00269                 // If threaded it may be possible that a sound is trying to be played
00270                 // before its actually been opened by the thread, if so mark it so
00271                 // that it can be automatically played when ready.
00272                 if (!mFileOpened)
00273                 {
00274                         if ( !mPauseDelayed )
00275                         {
00276                                 mPauseDelayed = true;
00277                                 // Register this sound with the manager so it can be polled to play when ready
00278                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingletonPtr()->queueDelayedSound(this, DA_PAUSE);
00279                         }
00280                         return;
00281                 }
00282 #endif
00283 
00284                 if ( mSource==AL_NONE ) return;
00285 
00286                 alSourcePause(mSource);
00287 
00288                 mPauseDelayed=false;
00289         }
00290         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00291         void OgreOggStaticSound::play()
00292         {
00293 #if OGGSOUND_THREADED
00294                 boost::recursive_mutex::scoped_lock l(mMutex);
00295 
00296                 // If threaded it may be possible that a sound is trying to be played
00297                 // before its actually been opened by the thread, if so mark it so
00298                 // that it can be automatically played when ready.
00299                 if (!mFileOpened)
00300                 {
00301                         if ( !mPlayDelayed )
00302                         {
00303                                 mPlayDelayed = true;
00304                                 // Register this sound with the manager so it can be polled to play when ready
00305                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingletonPtr()->queueDelayedSound(this, DA_PLAY);
00306                         }
00307                         return;
00308                 }
00309 #endif
00310 
00311                 if(isPlaying())
00312                         return;
00313 
00314                 if (mSource == AL_NONE)
00315                         if ( !OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().requestSoundSource(this) )
00316                                 return;
00317 
00318                 // Pick up playback position change..
00319                 if ( mPlayPosChanged )
00320                         setPlayPosition(mPlayPos);
00321 
00322                 alSourcePlay(mSource);
00323                 mPlay = true;
00324                 mPlayDelayed=false;
00325         }
00326         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00327         void OgreOggStaticSound::stop()
00328         {
00329 #if OGGSOUND_THREADED
00330                 boost::recursive_mutex::scoped_lock l(mMutex);
00331 
00332                 // If threaded it may be possible that a sound is trying to be played
00333                 // before its actually been opened by the thread, if so mark it so
00334                 // that it can be automatically played when ready.
00335                 if (!mFileOpened)
00336                 {
00337                         if ( !mPlayDelayed )
00338                         {
00339                                 mPlayDelayed = true;
00340                                 // Register this sound with the manager so it can be polled to play when ready
00341                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingletonPtr()->queueDelayedSound(this, DA_PLAY);
00342                         }
00343                         return;
00344                 }
00345 #endif
00346 
00347                 if ( mSource==AL_NONE ) return;
00348 
00349                 alSourceStop(mSource);
00350                 alSourceRewind(mSource);
00351                 mPlay=false;
00352                 mPreviousOffset=0;
00353                 mStopDelayed=false;
00354 
00355                 // Give up source immediately if specfied
00356                 if (mGiveUpSource) OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().releaseSoundSource(this);
00357         }
00358         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00359         void OgreOggStaticSound::loop(bool loop)
00360         {
00361                 OgreOggISound::loop(loop);
00362 
00363                 if(mSource != AL_NONE)
00364                 {
00365                         alSourcei(mSource,AL_LOOPING, loop);
00366                 }
00367         }
00368         /*/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////*/
00369         void OgreOggStaticSound::_updateAudioBuffers()
00370         {
00371                 // Automatically play if ready.
00372                 if (mPlayDelayed)
00373                         play();
00374 
00375                 if(mSource == AL_NONE || !mPlay)
00376                         return;
00377 
00378                 ALenum state;
00379                 alGetSourcei(mSource, AL_SOURCE_STATE, &state);
00380 
00381                 if (state == AL_STOPPED)
00382                 {
00383                         stop();
00384                         // Finished callback
00385                         if ( mFinishedCB && mFinCBEnabled )
00386                                 mFinishedCB->execute(static_cast<OgreOggISound*>(this));
00387                 }
00388                 else
00389                 {
00390                         ALint bytes=0;
00391 
00392                         // Use byte offset to work out current position
00393                         alGetSourcei(mSource, AL_BYTE_OFFSET, &bytes);
00394 
00395                         // Has the audio looped?
00396                         if ( mPreviousOffset>bytes )
00397                         {
00398                                 if ( mLoopCB && mLoopCBEnabled )
00399                                         mLoopCB->execute(static_cast<OgreOggISound*>(this));
00400                         }
00401 
00402                         // Store current offset position
00403                         mPreviousOffset=bytes;
00404                 }
00405         }
00406 }
